mapper.insert: INSERT INTO his.register_info (register_info_state, register_info_records_book, register_info_fee, register_info_pay_type, register_info_doctor_id, register_info_patient_id, register_info_user_id) VALUES (#{register_info_state}, #{register_info_records_book}, #{register_info_fee}, #{register_info_pay_type}, #{register_info_doctor_id}, #{register_info_patient_id}, #{register_info_user_id})
